name: Tyrant Maw
customPrimary:
Takes 4 seconds to charge up and fires for 4 seconds. Upon fully charged a powerful pulse is released with the beam dealing massive burst damage to the target and triggering a devastating and uncontrolled cascade of arcs that chain between ships near the target. Firing the Maw while the Tyrant Eye system is activated results in greatly increased destructive potential.

Shield and weapon modules are disabled while the Tyrant Maw is active. Using this weapon will cause the shield modules to briefly overload. Interrupting the firing process by venting or overloading causes 25% CR loss. Begins combat unloaded due to safety precautions.

customPrimary: Each flare has a %s chance to divert nearby missiles.
